title: Dark elven arrow (SLASH'EM)
data:
- *For the weapon in [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), see [dark elven arrow (EvilHack)](/wiki/Dark_elven_arrow_\(EvilHack\) "Dark elven arrow (EvilHack)").*

| ) [![Dark elven arrow.png](/images/3/3c/Dark_elven_arrow.png)](/wiki/File:Dark_elven_arrow.png) |                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| Name                                                                                            | dark elven arrow                                       |
| Appearance                                                                                      | black runed arrow                                      |
| Damage vs. small                                                                                | 1d7                                                    |
| Damage vs. large                                                                                | 1d6                                                    |
| To-hit bonus                                                                                    | +0                                                     |
| Weapon skill                                                                                    | [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow")                                 |
| Size                                                                                            | [one-handed](/wiki/One-handed "One-handed")            |
| Base price                                                                                      | 2 [zm](/wiki/Zorkmid "Zorkmid") (+10/positive enchant) |
| Weight                                                                                          | [1](/wiki/Weight "Weight")                             |
| Material                                                                                        | [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood")                              |

A **dark elven arrow** is a type of [weapon](/wiki/Weapon "Weapon") that appears in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [SpliceHack](/wiki/SpliceHack "SpliceHack") and [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"). It is a [stackable](/wiki/Stackable "Stackable") [projectile](/wiki/Projectile "Projectile") that is designed for use with a [dark elven bow](/wiki/Dark_elven_bow_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Dark elven bow (SLASH'EM)"), and uses the [bow](/wiki/Bow "Bow") [skill](/wiki/Skill "Skill"). It is made of [wood](/wiki/Wood "Wood"), and appears as a **black runed arrow** when [unidentified](/wiki/Identification "Identification").

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Generation](#Generation)

  - [1.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [1.2 SpliceHack](#SpliceHack)
  - [1.3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [2 Description](#Description)

- [3 Strategy](#Strategy)

- [4 References](#References)

## Generation

[Drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven arrow. Drow [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger") start the game with a dark elven bow and two stacks of dark elven arrows in place of the role's standard bow and [arrows](/wiki/Arrow "Arrow").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)

Drow in [SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM](/wiki/Drow_\(SLASH%27EM\) "Drow (SLASH'EM)") [and SpliceHack](/wiki/Drow_\(SpliceHack\) "Drow (SpliceHack)") [always generate with](/wiki/Monster_starting_inventory "Monster starting inventory") a dark elven bow and 3-14 dark elven arrows.[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)

### SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dark elven arrows are not randomly generated. [Upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") regular arrows has a 1⁄3 chance of producing dark elven arrows.[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)

### SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, dark elven arrows are not randomly generated, and normally-generated dark elven arrows are always created [drugged](/wiki/Drugged "Drugged").

### SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, dark elven arrows can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general [stores](/wiki/Store "Store"), used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven arrows. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

## Description

The dark elven arrow is nearly identical to the [elven arrow](/wiki/Elven_arrow "Elven arrow") minus its appearance: it has the same damage versus small and large monsters, though it lacks the elven arrow's 1⁄3 chance of a [multishot](/wiki/Multishot "Multishot") bonus.

Upgrading dark elven arrows will produce regular arrows.[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

## Strategy

Dark elven arrows are among the best type of arrows, but are much harder to find than the other types. Some drow Rangers may be tempted to trade off their starting arrows for elven arrows to take advantage of the multishot bonus (or more ideally upgrade them using unwanted [gain level](/wiki/Potion_of_gain_level "Potion of gain level") [potions](/wiki/Potion "Potion")), and may also consider collecting and enchanting [ya](/wiki/Ya "Ya") for the [to-hit](/wiki/To-hit "To-hit") bonus and better damage against large monsters.

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 359](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c#line359 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c")
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 371](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c#line371 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/makemon.c")
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2278](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/potion.c#line2278 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/potion.c")
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2270](/wiki/Source:SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/potion.c#line2270 "Source:SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/potion.c")

[![This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.](/images/3/38/Se7e7-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article may require revision for the next version of SLASH'EM. Click here for more information.")

[![This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.](/images/5/5d/Nh343var-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article describes a 3.4.3-based variant of NetHack. Click here for more information.")
html:
Dark elven arrow (SLASH'EM)

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
For the weapon in EvilHack, see dark elven arrow (EvilHack).
)
Name dark elven arrow
Appearance black runed arrow
Damage vs. small 1d7
Damage vs. large 1d6
To-hit bonus +0
Weapon skill bow
Size one-handed
Base price 2 zm
(+10/positive
enchant)
Weight 1
Material wood

A dark elven arrow is a type of weapon that appears in SLASH'EM, SpliceHack and SlashTHEM. It is a stackable projectile that is designed for use with a dark elven bow, and uses the bow skill. It is made of wood, and appears as a black runed arrow when unidentified.

Contents

  • 1 Generation
    • 1.1 SLASH'EM
    • 1.2 SpliceHack
    • 1.3 SlashTHEM
  • 2 Description
  • 3 Strategy
  • 4 References

Generation

Drow characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven arrow. Drow Rangers start the game with a dark elven bow and two stacks of dark elven arrows in place of the role's standard bow and arrows.[1]

Drow in SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM and SpliceHack always generate with a dark elven bow and 3-14 dark elven arrows.[2]

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, dark elven arrows are not randomly generated. Upgrading regular arrows has a 1⁄3 chance of producing dark elven arrows.[3]

SpliceHack

In SpliceHack, dark elven arrows are not randomly generated, and normally-generated dark elven arrows are always created drugged.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, dark elven arrows can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general stores, used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven arrows. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

Description

The dark elven arrow is nearly identical to the elven arrow minus its appearance: it has the same damage versus small and large monsters, though it lacks the elven arrow's 1⁄3 chance of a multishot bonus.

Upgrading dark elven arrows will produce regular arrows.[4]

Strategy

Dark elven arrows are among the best type of arrows, but are much harder to find than the other types. Some drow Rangers may be tempted to trade off their starting arrows for elven arrows to take advantage of the multishot bonus (or more ideally upgrade them using unwanted gain level potions), and may also consider collecting and enchanting ya for the to-hit bonus and better damage against large monsters.

References

  1. ↑ makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 359
  2. ↑ makemon.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 371
  3. ↑ potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2278
  4. ↑ potion.c in SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2, line 2270

A '''dark elven arrow''' is a type of [[weapon]] that appears in [[SLASH'EM]], [[SpliceHack]] and [[SlashTHEM]]. It is a [[stackable]] [[projectile]] that is designed for use with a [[Dark elven bow (SLASH'EM)|dark elven bow]], and uses the [[bow]] [[skill]]. It is made of [[wood]], and appears as a '''black runed arrow''' when [[identification|unidentified]].

==Generation==
[[Drow (starting race)|Drow]] characters start the game with knowledge of the dark elven arrow. Drow [[Ranger]]s start the game with a dark elven bow and two stacks of dark elven arrows in place of the role's standard bow and [[arrow]]s.{{refsrc|makemon.c|359|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

Drow in [[Drow (SLASH'EM)|SLASH'EM, SlashTHEM]] [[Drow (SpliceHack)|and SpliceHack]] [[Monster starting inventory|always generate with]] a dark elven bow and 3-14 dark elven arrows.{{refsrc|makemon.c|371|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===SLASH'EM===
In SLASH'EM, dark elven arrows are not randomly generated. [[Upgrading]] regular arrows has a {{frac|3}} chance of producing dark elven arrows.{{refsrc|potion.c|2278|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

===SpliceHack===
In SpliceHack, dark elven arrows are not randomly generated, and normally-generated dark elven arrows are always created [[drugged]].

===SlashTHEM===
In SlashTHEM, dark elven arrows can be randomly generated like other weapons, and general [[store]]s, used armor dealerships and antique weapon outlets can sell dark elven arrows. Upgrading works the same as in SLASH'EM.

==Description==
The dark elven arrow is nearly identical to the [[elven arrow]] minus its appearance: it has the same damage versus small and large monsters, though it lacks the elven arrow's {{frac|3}} chance of a [[multishot]] bonus.

Upgrading dark elven arrows will produce regular arrows.{{refsrc|potion.c|2270|version=SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2}}

==Strategy==
Dark elven arrows are among the best type of arrows, but are much harder to find than the other types. Some drow Rangers may be tempted to trade off their starting arrows for elven arrows to take advantage of the multishot bonus (or more ideally upgrade them using unwanted {{! of|gain level}} [[potion]]s), and may also consider collecting and enchanting [[ya]] for the [[to-hit]] bonus and better damage against large monsters.
